page.title: 12CLUBS IN NASSINGTON page b.
page.content: {Nassington Ladies Group}This group has had a white elephant stall,a craft evening and other events.{Nassington Village Hall}The Committee organise the May Fayre and a monthly lottery. {Nassington Football Club}The members practice regularly and play weekend matches at many villages.{Adult Education Courses}There are varied classes such as Keep Fit and Dress- Making which are held in the school and village hall.{Local History Group} This group has a few active members. {Nassington And Yarwell Conservatives} This is a fund raising group for the Conservative Party.{Sunday School}The Sunday School is held in the Old School House and is led by some of the parents of children at Nassington School. {Nassington Singers}This is a new group which meets regularly at the village hall.
